about_the_game:
Do you want additional communication problems?


Looking for new challenges? Looking for puzzles? Looking for mutual aid? Looking for additional exposure for the main game?
These additional levels for the main game are a must for you and your significant other (or the one friend you will be playing with)

Discover 14 new levels


This love-themed level pack contains two new runs:

  • The Love Levels: Will you overcome all the difficulties together ? Your ability to communicate efficiently will be challenged to understand how each of your actions is impacting the other player.
  • Secret Run: Find the orange sphere to unlock those bigger and even more complex levels. All your skills will be necessary to succeed.

New mechanics


Love doesn't follow the rules! This expansion adds new mechanics that are twisting your understanding.

Will you understand what this new spheres are doing? What are these strange elevators? What is the other player seeing?

Win together or fail separately!


Regards,
Le DoubleSept
